SELECT QSTCODE, QSTCCONTENT, QSTTITLE, QSTCONTENT, MEMID, QSTATTACH, QSTDATE , ADMINID, ADMINANS, ADMINANSDATE, CASE WHEN QSTANSCODE IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS QSTANSSTATE FROM VIEW_QUESTION WHERE MEMCODE = #{memCode} ORDER BY QSTCODE

SELECT QSTCODE, QSTCCONTENT, QSTTITLE, QSTCONTENT, MEMID, QSTATTACH, QSTDATE, ADMINID , ADMINANS, ADMINANSDATE, CASE WHEN QSTANSCODE IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS QSTANSSTATE FROM VIEW_QUESTION WHERE QSTCODE=#{qstCode} ORDER BY QSTCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION(QSTCODE, QSTCCODE, MEMCODE, QSTTITLE, QSTCONTENT, QSTATTACH, QSTDATE) VALUES(SEQQUESTION.NEXTVAL, #{qstcCode}, #{memCode}, #{qstTitle}, #{qstContent}, #{qstAttach}, SYSDATE)
